00051 #include "youbot/EthercatMaster.hpp"
00052 
00053 namespace youbot {
00054 
00055 EthercatMasterInterface* EthercatMaster::instance = 0;
00056 ///creates a instance of the singleton EthercatMaster if there is none and returns a reference to it
00057 ///@param configFile configuration file name incl. the extension
00058 ///@param configFilePath the path where the configuration is located with a / at the end
00059 ///@param ethercatMasterWithThread set it to false if you want to deactivate the communication thread
00060 EthercatMasterInterface& EthercatMaster::getInstance(const std::string configFile, const std::string configFilePath, const bool ethercatMasterWithThread)
00061 {
00062   // Bouml preserved body begin 000E61F1
00063     if (instance == 0) {
00064       if(ethercatMasterWithThread){
00065         instance = new EthercatMasterWithThread(configFile, configFilePath);
00066       }else{
00067         instance = new EthercatMasterWithoutThread(configFile, configFilePath);
00068       }
00069     }
00070     return *instance;
00071   // Bouml preserved body end 000E61F1
00072 }
00073 
00074 /// destroy the singleton instance by calling the destructor
00075 void EthercatMaster::destroy()
00076 {
00077   // Bouml preserved body begin 000E6271
00078     if(instance != 0){
00079       delete instance;
00080       instance = 0;
00081     }
00082   // Bouml preserved body end 000E6271
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 } // namespace youbot
